title: 100 Ghost Collection - Novel Updates
author: Jiu Lu Fei Xiang   九鹭非香
description:
In everyone’s heart dwells a demon.

She has a pen, carries an ethereal desire, and travels back and forth to different spaces.

Recording many “ghost” love affairs…

Heroine’s Monologue:

Bai Gui is my name but also the name of my pen. After collecting 100 ghosts, it will replace me to fulfill my thousand-year-old dream. With the ebb and flow of the secular world and the slow passing of time, I did not know how many times I had traveled back and forth between spaces, seen how many sorrowful partings and joyful reunions, or the old friends that I had gradually forgotten. I had no emotions but only that long-cherished wish in my heart that never changed…

----

Using a “heroine” as the main connection,  This book is composed of multiple short stories. All stories do not obstruct the other.>
